programme.title: Train
programme.desc: Join the friendly train conductor and adorable cartoon train as they go on magical journeys and gentle adventures, making sure all of their passengers get taken to the right place at the right time. The short stories are designed to teach your little ones about grouping and categories, using colour, shape, size and purpose to demonstrate this logical task.

programme.title: Finn and Fianna
programme.desc: Finn and Fianna, the two little elves, are studying their environment and discovering their environment with a lot of curiousity! Getting to know their surroundings and the basic attributes that exist within it, join Finn and Fianna as they use their senses of seeing, tasting, feeling and discovering to develop your little ones thinking skills as well as what they see!

programme.title: Train
programme.desc: Join the friendly train conductor and adorable cartoon train as they go on magical journeys and gentle adventures, making sure all of their passengers get taken to the right place at the right time. The short stories are designed to teach your little ones about grouping and categories, using colour, shape, size and purpose to demonstrate this logical task.

programme.title: Raul
programme.desc: Raul and Birdie are best friends. Raul is an adorable green hippopotamus who loves to go on exciting adventures and Birdie is his side kick. These two lovable characters find themselves in all sort of situations as they journey around the countryside, but with each others help they will always find their way out of any problem.

programme.title: Planet Jumpers
programme.desc: Planet Jumpers is a series set in the future, in space. Through the everyday life of the siblings Luna and Lou we get to know different planets, funky futuristic objects and places while developing the socialization skills of our preschooler viewers.

programme.title: Doll Team to the Rescue
programme.desc: Bell and her trusty friends Fido the Kangaroo and Lilo the Bear come to the rescue in the forest for anybody that needs it! Doll Team to the Rescue teaches the importance of social skills, friendship and treating animals with love and respect.

programme.title: Galaxy Tourists
programme.desc: Galaxy Tourists is out of this world. Following the stories of a trusty space-travelling rocket and his planet-discovering captain, this show is all about the friendship building expeditions and adventures of this space exploring pair. In classic Duck TV style this show stimulates the senses of its young audience and encourages creating thinking and imagination.

programme.title: Elf World
programme.desc: Two elves join together to explore Dreamworld, and they want you to come along, too! As with many of the Duck TV productions, there is also an educational purpose to this bright and engaging cartoon. This will enhance your childs creativity and encourage them to think creatively, while keeping them entertained throughout.

programme.title: India
programme.desc: Want an adventure? Join an Indian boy and his elephant as they travel and explore their own country, visiting the market place and meeting new people! Designed for young audiences to experience various adventures, vibrant colours, smooth animation and music aids children to develop their thinking and observational skills, as well as stimulating their senses!

programme.title: Connected World
programme.desc: Join the children in this friendly multicultural day-care centre and learn about the diverse heritages of each of the toddlers. Learn where each of the pupils are from and even try to guess their nationalities from their clothing, favourite landmarks and special foods. Help them to narrate the stories and encourage them to be curious about new cultures, languages and countries.

programme.title: Africa
programme.desc: Go on a journey through the continent of Africa and meet all of the native animals as they roam around having fun and playing games in their natural environment. Africa introduces its young viewers to a wider range of animals, including some lesser known ones that they probably havent heard of before, a great way for children to develop their cognitive and observational skills.

programme.title: Dotty, the Kitty
programme.desc: Get creative with Dotty the Kitty and follow the dotted line left by the pencil to try and create a masterpiece. Uncover the final painting and unlock the imagination of your child all at the same time. Dotty the Kitty helps kids to develop their shape recognition, hand-eye coordination and their ability to associate objects with their realistic shapes and colours!

programme.title: Ristorante
programme.desc: Welcome to the Ristorante, come in and find out how the restaurant works. Learn about all the different processes starting with the preparation and moving to the baking or the cooking, the serving and finally to the dish washing. Encourage your little ones to play pretend, cooking up some imaginary treats for you, your friends and family. Learn some new vocabulary, stimulate your senses and having fun.

programme.title: Groups
programme.desc: This adorable fox will help your little ones to learn how to categorise objects. This show is enhanced with sufficient interaction with the children that its aimed at, for example the learning of older children is enhanced by asking them questions such as "whats different" between two or more objects. For younger children it is more beneficial to just point out these differences or similarities.

Designed with education and creativity, Mini Fairy Tales ensures to bring your childs imagination to life, encouraging parents to get involved and participate in telling stories your young ones! Come on an adventure and join in with the fairy-tale!

programme.title: Enchanting Sights
programme.desc: Colourful moving geometric shapes, which should enable your child to learn the names of basic shapes. The shapes spin and spiral around the television screen. This enchanting display is accompanied by soothing music. This programme is not only designed to help children in learning the names of shapes, but it allows them to experience colours and music, too, nurturing your childs imagination.

programme.title: Get Up!
programme.desc: We should not just sit in front of the TV! Lets stand up and move. Langi, Rundi and Rendi exercise, imitating the movements of Nature. Lets keep up with them to improve our coordination and strengthen our health.

programme.title: We Are Playing Now
programme.desc: Educational childrens magazine exploring the world around us, including familiar people and objects through drawing and painting. It helps children develop cognitive skills, as well as parent-child emotional relations, introducing them to different situations.

programme.title: Vege-tales
programme.desc: In Veggie-tales, childrens animated series, talking fruit and vegetable perform theatrical productions based on very kind stories. Main characters Bob the Tomato and Larry the Cucumber with the help of other vegetables are telling stories and teaching kids the basic human values, like honesty, thankfulness, kindness.

programme.title: Dance
programme.desc: Come and join the dance party! Get up and get moving with these three adorable characters as they dance around the screen to different songs and tunes. And lets be honest, everyone loves to have a good dance.

programme.title: Get Up!

programme.title: Sport, Sport, Sport
programme.desc: Learning about sports has never been more fun! This exciting animated show teaches us all about different kinds of exercises, physical activity and sports, promoting the benefits of being healthy and encouraging its young viewers to expand their hobbies by exploring new sports. For the littlest viewers, this sport-tastic show promotes motor skills and movement, increasing muscle strength and balance!

programme.title: Waterworld
programme.desc: Learn how important water is to life on earth. This informative animation is something adults and children can enjoy together, while learning about animal habits and their habitats. Making the world of water come to life, help your child recognise and name animals to increase cognitive processes and strengthen memory. Submerge yourself in a world of fish and dont miss out.

programme.title: Colorwheel
programme.desc: One brave little pup is determined to find his friend, who is lost in the forest. He uses his trusty colour wheel to navigate his way, using skills of reasoning and logic. This programme is a Duck TV production, that intends to educate its audience, alongside entertaining them. In this series, children will develop skills such as problem solving, decision making, and also knowledge around colour.

programme.desc: Miyu and Litto want you to come on their latest adventure! This is a Duck TV production, designed to both entertain and educate young children. Problem solving and decision making are key to the success of their adventures, along with their trusty colour wheel, too. Will you be able to apply skills of logic and reasoning to help Miyu and Litto in their adventures?

programme.title: Safari
programme.desc: Children can learn about the various wild and not-so wild animals from this well beautifully illustrated safari related programme. It goes on to explore each animals habitats within the environment it lives in but also studies their behaviour. This will provide children with a real insight into animals they already know and some that they may not and include facts that are not always provided.

programme.title: Groups
programme.desc: This adorable fox will help your little ones to learn how to categorise objects. This show is enhanced with sufficient interaction with the children that its aimed at, for example the learning of older children is enhanced by asking them questions such as "whats different" between two or more objects. For younger children it is more beneficial to just point out these differences or similarities.

programme.title: Whats Your Job?
programme.desc: "Whats Your Job" introduces younger audiences to various professions in society and combines education with enjoyment. When watching this series, parents are advised to talk about the jobs that are being shown so that they are able to learn why people do the profession that they do. Encouraging education and fun, this show introduces children to new words that they can learn but in a creative way.

programme.title: In the Museum
programme.desc: In a big museum full of beautiful art something peculiar keeps happening. Every now and then an animal disappears from the paintings. Can you help Mr.Clown as he journeys around the museum in search of his missing friends? In a great introduction to different types of art, In the Museum helps to reinforce shape recognition and improve young viewers ability to recognise and identify different animals.

programme.title: Train
programme.desc: Join the friendly train conductor and adorable cartoon train as they go on magical journeys and gentle adventures, making sure all of their passengers get taken to the right place at the right time. The short stories are designed to teach your little ones about grouping and categories, using colour, shape, size and purpose to demonstrate this logical task.

programme.title: Mimo and Bobo PLUS
programme.desc: Join the two familiar characters who have become preschoolers but still love fun adventures which teach them about various useful things. In their amazing adventures, Mimo and Bobo learn about friendship, sharing, helping others and more, helping children develop their social and observational skills.

programme.title: Sunville - Sportsville
programme.desc: Mister Goat, the Raccoon Family, Kitty Cat and the Friendly Pig are participating in Sports Day, and they want you to come along and join the fun! In doing so, not only will your child have lots of fun, but they will be exercising and developing basic coordination skills along the way. They will also increase muscle strength and sense of balance, which will keep them healthy and happy!

programme.title: World of Toys
programme.desc: Enter a world of games and experience with us fantastic adventures or exercise your fingers and conjure up some exquisite art jewellery. No manuals are needed to do this. Create your own special story and discover new possibilities how to spend a moment together.

programme.title: Ducky Adventures
programme.desc: Every day is a different adventure for Ducky! This animated show lets toddlers and pre-schoolers to join Ducky to learn through daily activities. This series is brought to you by DuckTV, which works with child psychologists in creating programmes for babies and toddlers. Ducky Adventures has been designed to help your child develop their observational skills whilst also letting them use their imagination and creativity.

programme.title: Hop-hop
programme.desc: Hop-hop is a cartoon for the littlest viewers of 6 to 36 months old and their families. Its engaging and educational content together with peaceful music and colorful catching picture is very entertaining. Cute Bunnies do everything together- play, eat, brush their teeth, walk, run, swim, have fun.

programme.title: Mimo and Bobo
programme.desc: Mimo, the cute little panda bear and his loyal friend Bobo, encourage you to describe and narrate what you see. Through this show, it will teach your child about developing social skills, teach them the values of friendship and join Mimo and Bobo on their adventures and experience them together! Encourage your little ones and ask them questions about their journey through each episode.

programme.title: Animals
programme.desc: An educational show which teaches children everything they need to know about all sorts of animals, ranging from a familiar domestic cat or even the wildest of tigers found in the deepest of wildernesses. The programme explores how each and every one of these animals behaves, eats and plays and compares those characteristics to those us humans adopt.

programme.title: Elf World
programme.desc: Two elves join together to explore Dreamworld, and they want you to come along, too! As with many of the Duck TV productions, there is also an educational purpose to this bright and engaging cartoon. This will enhance your childs creativity and encourage them to think creatively, while keeping them entertained throughout.

programme.title: Sea Adventure
programme.desc: Gentle animation set to music. Sea Adventure follows the lives of two lively little fish who are growing up in their natural environment. This show can be used to help teach toddlers new vocabulary.

programme.title: Vege-tales
programme.desc: In Veggie-tales, childrens animated series, talking fruit and vegetable perform theatrical productions based on very kind stories. Main characters Bob the Tomato and Larry the Cucumber with the help of other vegetables are telling stories and teaching kids the basic human values, like honesty, thankfulness, kindness.

programme.title: The World of Animals
programme.desc: This childrens cartoon is both educational and entertaining. Children will develop their knowledge on animals, so that they cannot only name animals, but they have a basic understanding of how and where they might live. Children can then apply this knowledge to their everyday lives, either in zoos, or even parks. As a result, children have greater respect for and interest in the environment.

programme.title: Sunville - Sportsville
programme.desc: Mister Goat, the Raccoon Family, Kitty Cat and the Friendly Pig are participating in Sports Day, and they want you to come along and join the fun! In doing so, not only will your child have lots of fun, but they will be exercising and developing basic coordination skills along the way. They will also increase muscle strength and sense of balance, which will keep them healthy and happy!

programme.title: Leon-ART
programme.desc: Join the painter bear as he draws and paints friends for himself to play with. What are his painted friends today? The series is a perfect bedtime story to relax before going to bed. The bear helps to encourage imagination and develop basic visual and motor skills. A whole family can paint together for the perfect bonding activity of parents and children.

programme.title: Hipp-hopp Cactus
programme.desc: Join three houseplants and a busy little bee as they learn more about the objects, shapes and colours they find around their home. Once theyre sure no one is around, the trio of plants come to life and identify where to find them and how to use them properly. Learn up to 20 new words a day as your child has fun labelling the objects they see while searching for them in your own home.

programme.title: Small - But Hardworking
programme.desc: Three elves build a variety of different objects with materials such as wood and ice. This show is designed to be both educational and entertaining. It advances childrens imagination, by stimulating their senses with a bright colourful cartoon. Objects coming to life also enhances the focus on promoting creative imagination. This programme also aids children in beginning to recognise shapes.

programme.title: Connected World
programme.desc: Join the children in this friendly multicultural day-care centre and learn about the diverse heritages of each of the toddlers. Learn where each of the pupils are from and even try to guess their nationalities from their clothing, favourite landmarks and special foods. Help them to narrate the stories and encourage them to be curious about new cultures, languages and countries.

programme.title: Ducky and Fluffy
programme.desc: The Ducky family has a brand new member! With the arrival of her little brother Fluffy, Ducky experiences a wide range of new emotions and finds herself in new situations. Stories are created with the support of child psychologists to help children adjust to the arrival of a new sibling.

programme.title: Mini Fairy Tales

Come on an adventure and join in with the fairy-tale!

programme.title: India
programme.desc: Want an adventure? Join an Indian boy and his elephant as they travel and explore their own country, visiting the market place and meeting new people! Designed for young audiences to experience various adventures, vibrant colours, smooth animation and music aids children to develop their thinking and observational skills, as well as stimulating their senses!

programme.desc: Meet a little geek boy named Zack and his best friend, a dog named Ziggy as they help children learn the concept of size through funny adventures, laughter and games. Join them as they make size based line ups, groups, and comparisons, having lots of fun along the way.

programme.title: Mimos World
programme.desc: Join some of our favourite Duck TV characters as they embark on lots of new adventures. Our little panda bear Mimo and his best friend Bobo from "Didy Baby" and "Mimo and Bobo" journey around Mimos world meeting new friends and having fun. This exciting new show puts a massive emphasis on the importance of friendship and teaches us all about different friendship values.

programme.title: Hubbi Will Take Care of It
programme.desc: Hubbi hippo, Matti beaver and Milo and the ultimate DIY trio, no task is too great for this ferocious three. They are determined to fix everything, helping everyone they meet along the way. No job is too big for this group of friends. This cartoon is not only incredibly entertaining, but it promotes problem-solving, and encourages observational and cognitive skills within young children.

programme.title: Mimos World
programme.desc: Join some of our favourite Duck TV characters as they embark on lots of new adventures. programme.title: Sippi Sappi

The programme aims to encourage its young viewers to engage in sporting activites, encourage creative thinking and relate to other childrens adventures. Aired on Duck TV Sippi Sappi is an all round fun way to get your little ones active and excited about sport.

programme.title: Sounds Around Us
programme.desc: Join elf twins Liza and Ben to learn more about sounds, how to find them and how to recreate them. Follow them as they whizz away on exciting adventures together to investigate where different familiar sounds are coming from. Play along with the twins and encourage your child to listen and identify the sounds you hear together. Can you work out the source before the twins do?

programme.title: Tempo Giusto
programme.desc: Learning about time can be hard, but Tempo Giusto makes it so much fun. Go on an adventure with Henry and Lola as they introduce you to the basics concepts of time, help you develop your pre-math skills and teach you about the sequencing of events. Lola uses her love of numbers to tell the time whilst Henry uses his amazing storytelling skills to show us what kids get up to at different times of the day.

programme.desc: Living and playing in a beautiful house is so much fun, but Margo and Felix also have to be responsible in order to look after the house. Join these two best friend for creative thinking and lots of games!

programme.desc: Join some of our favourite Duck TV characters as they embark on lots of new adventures. Our little panda bear Mimo and his best friend Bobo from "Didy Baby" and "Mimo and Bobo" journey around Mimos world meeting new friends and having fun. This exciting new show puts a massive emphasis on the importance of friendship and teaches us all about different friendship values.

programme.title: Doll Team
programme.desc: This cartoon is both incredibly entertaining, and educational. In accompanying these three friends, your child will learn social skills, and friendship. The trio that will take you on this journey are Bell, the sweetest flower-doll, Lilo, the cuddly teddy bear, and Fido, the incredibly playful kangaroo. The three friends are determined to help the inhabitants of the undergrowth however they can.

programme.title: Milo Dino
programme.desc: Following the adventures of a curious little dino boy in the Mesosoic era, as he discovers the world around him. Join Milo and his friends and family to find out how dinosaurs lived. The programme helps little children develop their social skills, as well as their imagination, introducing them to the era of dinosaurs.

programme.title: Ducky and Fluffy
programme.desc: The Ducky family has a brand new member! With the arrival of her little brother Fluffy, Ducky experiences a wide range of new emotions and finds herself in new situations. Stories are created with the support of child psychologists to help children adjust to the arrival of a new sibling.

programme.title: Finn and Fianna
programme.desc: Finn and Fianna, the two little elves, are studying their environment and discovering their environment with a lot of curiousity! Getting to know their surroundings and the basic attributes that exist within it, join Finn and Fianna as they use their senses of seeing, tasting, feeling and discovering to develop your little ones thinking skills as well as what they see!

programme.title: Planet Jumpers
programme.desc: Planet Jumpers is a series set in the future, in space. Through the everyday life of the siblings Luna and Lou we get to know different planets, funky futuristic objects and places while developing the socialization skills of our preschooler viewers.

programme.title: Dinoland
programme.desc: Go on adventures with four adorable baby dinosaurs as they explore their environment and work together to solve tricky problems. Helping young viewers to develop their initial problem solving and decision making skills as well as developing their social skills makes Dinoland the perfect combination of fun and learning. Make the most of these educational lessons with dinosaur puppets or soft toys.

programme.title: Small - But Hardworking
programme.desc: Three elves build a variety of different objects with materials such as wood and ice. This show is designed to be both educational and entertaining. It advances childrens imagination, by stimulating their senses with a bright colourful cartoon. Objects coming to life also enhances the focus on promoting creative imagination. This programme also aids children in beginning to recognise shapes.

programme.title: Doll Team
programme.desc: This cartoon is both incredibly entertaining, and educational. In accompanying these three friends, your child will learn social skills, and friendship. programme.title: Happy Kingdom
programme.desc: Catching up with the adorable bunnies from Happy Meadows, Happy Kingdom introduces lots more fun characters such like a fearless-knight hedgehog and a caring cook-squirrel. Reinforcing the young viewers knowledge of different animals and developing their vocabulary in a new and fun way, Happy Kingdom is just as educational as it is exciting. Why not get involved and host an animal toy party whilst you watch.

programme.title: Train
programme.desc: Join the friendly train conductor and adorable cartoon train as they go on magical journeys and gentle adventures, making sure all of their passengers get taken to the right place at the right time. The short stories are designed to teach your little ones about grouping and categories, using colour, shape, size and purpose to demonstrate this logical task.

programme.title: Zoo
programme.desc: One friendly zoo keeper wants you to come along and meet all the exciting animals hes looking after, and learn a few things on the way, too! This cartoon for young children, encourages them to recognise and name a variety of animals, acquire basic vocabulary, and associate the sounds animals with the sounds that they make.

programme.title: Milo Dino
programme.desc: Following the adventures of a curious little dino boy in the Mesosoic era, as he discovers the world around him. Join Milo and his friends and family to find out how dinosaurs lived. The programme helps little children develop their social skills, as well as their imagination, introducing them to the era of dinosaurs.

programme.title: Leon-ART
programme.desc: Join the painter bear as he draws and paints friends for himself to play with. What are his painted friends today? The series is a perfect bedtime story to relax before going to bed. The bear helps to encourage imagination and develop basic visual and motor skills. A whole family can paint together for the perfect bonding activity of parents and children.

programme.title: Mimo and Bobo PLUS
programme.desc: Join the two familiar characters who have become preschoolers but still love fun adventures which teach them about various useful things. In their amazing adventures, Mimo and Bobo learn about friendship, sharing, helping others and more, helping children develop their social and observational skills.

programme.title: Toby McFly
programme.desc: This imaginative and creative childrens animation follows the adventures of Toby McFly, a canine aviator who presents us with a birds eye view of the world. After flying over many fascinating landscapes, active animals, busy people, and interesting places, Toby lands his aircraft and shows us, in detail, what we have just seen from above. The show is educational, stimulating, and informative as well as being fun and entertaining.

programme.title: Ducky and Fluffy
programme.desc: The Ducky family has a brand new member! With the arrival of her little brother Fluffy, Ducky experiences a wide range of new emotions and finds herself in new situations. Stories are created with the support of child psychologists to help children adjust to the arrival of a new sibling.

programme.title: Fireteam
programme.desc: Hop on board the bright red fire truck and follow the three little firemen as they get to work keeping their village safe. These silent animated shorts are perfect for educating your child on the importance of safety and the role of the emergency services. Encourage your child to develop their ability to problem solve and improve their decision-making skills by identifying hazards and solutions together.

programme.title: Planet Jumpers
programme.desc: Planet Jumpers is a series set in the future, in space. Through the everyday life of the siblings Luna and Lou we get to know different planets, funky futuristic objects and places while developing the socialization skills of our preschooler viewers.

programme.title: Hipp-hopp Cactus
programme.desc: Join three houseplants and a busy little bee as they learn more about the objects, shapes and colours they find around their home. Once theyre sure no one is around, the trio of plants come to life and identify where to find them and how to use them properly. Learn up to 20 new words a day as your child has fun labelling the objects they see while searching for them in your own home.

programme.title: Shaping Up
programme.desc: Join Shaping Up as the happy and smiling geometric shapes introduce shapes to younger audiences and combine to create various objects that children will recognise from their everyday world. Developing babies proper shape-recognition from using vibrant colours a smooth transitions, Shaping Up combines educative aspects so that babies are able to develop their image recognition and creative skills.

programme.title: Happy Meadow
programme.desc: Two happy rabbits, Sari and Nati have lots of fun playing in Happy Meadow, in this childrens cartoon. They have plenty of other lovable friends who also live in Happy Meadow with them. Duck TV aim to produce content for young children that is educating, and aids their development, while being entertaining at the same time. Children are encouraged to grow their vocabulary and recognise colours.

programme.title: Connected World
programme.desc: Join the children in this friendly multicultural day-care centre and learn about the diverse heritages of each of the toddlers. Learn where each of the pupils are from and even try to guess their nationalities from their clothing, favourite landmarks and special foods. Help them to narrate the stories and encourage them to be curious about new cultures, languages and countries.

programme.title: Margo and Felix
programme.desc: Living and playing in a beautiful house is so much fun, but Margo and Felix also have to be responsible in order to look after the house. Join these two best friend for creative thinking and lots of games!

programme.title: Happy Garden
programme.desc: Come into the Happy Garden where fruits, vegetables and plants will dance to entertain you! Happy Garden was designed to aid the development of younger audiences, learning about the world around them,.

programme.title: Zack and Ziggy
programme.desc: Meet a little geek boy named Zack and his best friend, a dog named Ziggy as they help children learn the concept of size through funny adventures, laughter and games. Join them as they make size based line ups, groups, and comparisons, having lots of fun along the way.

programme.title: Sippi Sappi
programme.desc: Sippi Sappi is an educational show about a couple of friends who love rollerskating around whilst on holiday in the countryside. The programme aims to encourage its young viewers to engage in sporting activites, encourage creative thinking and relate to other childrens adventures. Aired on Duck TV Sippi Sappi is an all round fun way to get your little ones active and excited about sport.

programme.title: Henrys Stories
programme.desc: Henry loves telling stories, but he needs your help to make sure its all in the correct order. Follow Henry in these silent animated shorts as he constructs stories with the help of his handy picture cards. Teach your children about logical thinking and deductive reasoning as you narrate the sequences together and solve his picture puzzles to see the story come to life.

programme.title: Lola and the Numbers
programme.desc: Lola and the Numbers makes counting fun for its littlest viewers. Lola is a playful young girl who helps us to identify different numbers, count from one to ten and develop our pre-math skills. The most important viewing tips for parents and little ones is that we always count with Lola! whether its in English or your own language, counting aling is always fun!

programme.title: Cucu, Im here!
programme.desc: Have some fun with the Cucus as they play hide and seek. Cucu, Im here! follows the cucus as they go on lots of adventures, playing games and laughing all day! What better way to improve young viewers cognitive skills, introducing them to object permanence and developing their thinking skills. Cucu, Im here! is the perfect way to have some fun whilst learning something new.

programme.title: The Shapies
programme.desc: The Shapies are here to show younger audiences to the world of shapes on fun adventures! Showing us where they fit in and what they resemble, The Shapies will enable toddlers to recognise shapes!

programme.title: Monica and Rudy
programme.desc: Monica and Rudy is a colorful animated series on Duck TV intended for the youngest viewers. Monica is a little girl who has a pet- a parrot named Rudy. Monica takes Rudy out of the cage and together they go on their little adventures- in the forest, in the park, or to the pond where they meet different animals and birds. Monica teaches Rudy to imitate the sounds made by the animals.

programme.title: Cucu, Im here!

From A to Z, the five friends take children through the steps to produce beautiful letters and write wonderful words.

programme.title: Sounds Around Us
programme.desc: Join elf twins Liza and Ben to learn more about sounds, how to find them and how to recreate them. Follow them as they whizz away on exciting adventures together to investigate where different familiar sounds are coming from. Play along with the twins and encourage your child to listen and identify the sounds you hear together. Can you work out the source before the twins do?

programme.title: Dotty, the Kitty
programme.desc: Get creative with Dotty the Kitty and follow the dotted line left by the pencil to try and create a masterpiece. Uncover the final painting and unlock the imagination of your child all at the same time. Dotty the Kitty helps kids to develop their shape recognition, hand-eye coordination and their ability to associate objects with their realistic shapes and colours!

programme.desc: Mimo, the cute little panda bear and his loyal friend Bobo, encourage you to describe and narrate what you see. programme.title: Home Sweet Home
programme.desc: As is the case with many Duck TV programmes, this programme is designed to both educate and entertain its young audience. This cartoon takes a look into the lives of a range of the cutest baby animals, and explores their family relationships. The cartoon develops social skills and understanding family relationships, alongside improving the ability to recognise different animals, too.

programme.title: Monica and Rudy
programme.desc: Monica and Rudy is a colorful animated series on Duck TV intended for the youngest viewers. Monica is a little girl who has a pet- a parrot named Rudy. Monica takes Rudy out of the cage and together they go on their little adventures- in the forest, in the park, or to the pond where they meet different animals and birds. Monica teaches Rudy to imitate the sounds made by the animals.

programme.title: Happy Meadow
programme.desc: Two happy rabbits, Sari and Nati have lots of fun playing in Happy Meadow, in this childrens cartoon. They have plenty of other lovable friends who also live in Happy Meadow with them. Duck TV aim to produce content for young children that is educating, and aids their development, while being entertaining at the same time. Children are encouraged to grow their vocabulary and recognise colours.

programme.title: The Shapies
programme.desc: The Shapies are here to show younger audiences to the world of shapes on fun adventures! Showing us where they fit in and what they resemble, The Shapies will enable toddlers to recognise shapes!

programme.title: Shaping Up
programme.desc: Join Shaping Up as the happy and smiling geometric shapes introduce shapes to younger audiences and combine to create various objects that children will recognise from their everyday world. Developing babies proper shape-recognition from using vibrant colours a smooth transitions, Shaping Up combines educative aspects so that babies are able to develop their image recognition and creative skills.

programme.title: DuckSchool

programme.desc: Living and playing in a beautiful house is so much fun, but Margo and Felix also have to be responsible in order to look after the house. Join these two best friend for creative thinking and lots of games!

programme.desc: Hop on board the bright red fire truck and follow the three little firemen as they get to work keeping their village safe. Learn about all the different processes starting with the preparation and moving to the baking or the cooking, the serving and finally to the dish washing. Encourage your little ones to play pretend, cooking up some imaginary treats for you, your friends and family. Learn some new vocabulary, stimulate your senses and having fun.

programme.title: Tempo Giusto
programme.desc: Learning about time can be hard, but Tempo Giusto makes it so much fun. Go on an adventure with Henry and Lola as they introduce you to the basics concepts of time, help you develop your pre-math skills and teach you about the sequencing of events. Lola uses her love of numbers to tell the time whilst Henry uses his amazing storytelling skills to show us what kids get up to at different times of the day.

programme.title: Train
programme.desc: Join the friendly train conductor and adorable cartoon train as they go on magical journeys and gentle adventures, making sure all of their passengers get taken to the right place at the right time. The short stories are designed to teach your little ones about grouping and categories, using colour, shape, size and purpose to demonstrate this logical task.

programme.title: Nature Dudes
programme.desc: Nature Dudes is a fun cartoon that helps its young viewers to learn about all things natural. They focus on teaching about identifying different animals, learning about their different habits and habitats. They also put a focus on seasons and the weather, helping its little viewers learn about rain and sunshine, in a fun and exciting way.

programme.title: Cucu, Im here!
programme.desc: Have some fun with the Cucus as they play hide and seek. Cucu, Im here! follows the cucus as they go on lots of adventures, playing games and laughing all day! What better way to improve young viewers cognitive skills, introducing them to object permanence and developing their thinking skills. Cucu, Im here! is the perfect way to have some fun whilst learning something new.

programme.title: Higher the Better
programme.desc: Come along with Kiteko the goofy giraffe and Umi the playful meerkat in Higher the Better as they watch the everyday life of toddlers and begin to learn about their everyday adventures! Travelling on field trips and making lots of fun when theyre playing, Higher the Better develops childrens social skills, encourages them to observe and think deeper about what they are watching on their screen.

programme.title: Shaping Up
programme.desc: Join Shaping Up as the happy and smiling geometric shapes introduce shapes to younger audiences and combine to create various objects that children will recognise from their everyday world. Developing babies proper shape-recognition from using vibrant colours a smooth transitions, Shaping Up combines educative aspects so that babies are able to develop their image recognition and creative skills.

programme.title: Ducky and Friends
programme.desc: Childrens programme that follows the amazing adventures of a lovable little duck named Ducky, and a variety of her friends. By watching their escapades, young viewers will have lots of fun, and they will also have a chance to learn about friendship, sharing, and playing nicely with friends.

programme.title: Monica and Rudy
programme.desc: Monica and Rudy is a colorful animated series on Duck TV intended for the youngest viewers. Monica is a little girl who has a pet- a parrot named Rudy. Monica takes Rudy out of the cage and together they go on their little adventures- in the forest, in the park, or to the pond where they meet different animals and birds. Monica teaches Rudy to imitate the sounds made by the animals.

programme.title: Mimo and Bobo
programme.desc: Mimo, the cute little panda bear and his loyal friend Bobo, encourage you to describe and narrate what you see. Through this show, it will teach your child about developing social skills, teach them the values of friendship and join Mimo and Bobo on their adventures and experience them together! Encourage your little ones and ask them questions about their journey through each episode.

programme.title: Ducky Adventures
programme.desc: Every day is a different adventure for Ducky! This animated show lets toddlers and pre-schoolers to join Ducky to learn through daily activities. This series is brought to you by DuckTV, which works with child psychologists in creating programmes for babies and toddlers. Ducky Adventures has been designed to help your child develop their observational skills whilst also letting them use their imagination and creativity.

programme.title: Small - But Hardworking
programme.desc: Three elves build a variety of different objects with materials such as wood and ice. This show is designed to be both educational and entertaining. It advances childrens imagination, by stimulating their senses with a bright colourful cartoon. Objects coming to life also enhances the focus on promoting creative imagination. This programme also aids children in beginning to recognise shapes.

programme.title: Doll Team to the Rescue
programme.desc: Bell and her trusty friends Fido the Kangaroo and Lilo the Bear come to the rescue in the forest for anybody that needs it! Doll Team to the Rescue teaches the importance of social skills, friendship and treating animals with love and respect.

programme.title: Fireteam
programme.desc: Hop on board the bright red fire truck and follow the three little firemen as they get to work keeping their village safe. These silent animated shorts are perfect for educating your child on the importance of safety and the role of the emergency services. Encourage your child to develop their ability to problem solve and improve their decision-making skills by identifying hazards and solutions together.

programme.title: Margo and Felix
programme.desc: Living and playing in a beautiful house is so much fun, but Margo and Felix also have to be responsible in order to look after the house. Join these two best friend for creative thinking and lots of games!

programme.title: Zoo
programme.desc: One friendly zoo keeper wants you to come along and meet all the exciting animals hes looking after, and learn a few things on the way, too! This cartoon for young children, encourages them to recognise and name a variety of animals, acquire basic vocabulary, and associate the sounds animals with the sounds that they make.

programme.title: Cucu, Im here!

Cucu, Im here! is the perfect way to have some fun whilst learning something new.

programme.title: Zack and Ziggy
programme.desc: Meet a little geek boy named Zack and his best friend, a dog named Ziggy as they help children learn the concept of size through funny adventures, laughter and games. Join them as they make size based line ups, groups, and comparisons, having lots of fun along the way.

programme.title: Toby McFly
programme.desc: This imaginative and creative childrens animation follows the adventures of Toby McFly, a canine aviator who presents us with a birds eye view of the world. After flying over many fascinating landscapes, active animals, busy people, and interesting places, Toby lands his aircraft and shows us, in detail, what we have just seen from above. The show is educational, stimulating, and informative as well as being fun and entertaining.

programme.title: Africa
programme.desc: Go on a journey through the continent of Africa and meet all of the native animals as they roam around having fun and playing games in their natural environment. Africa introduces its young viewers to a wider range of animals, including some lesser known ones that they probably havent heard of before, a great way for children to develop their cognitive and observational skills.

programme.title: Planet Jumpers

programme.title: World of Toys
programme.desc: Enter a world of games and experience with us fantastic adventures or exercise your fingers and conjure up some exquisite art jewellery. No manuals are needed to do this. Create your own special story and discover new possibilities how to spend a moment together.

Making the world of water come to life, help your child recognise and name animals to increase cognitive processes and strengthen memory. Submerge yourself in a world of fish and dont miss out.

programme.title: Elf World
programme.desc: Two elves join together to explore Dreamworld, and they want you to come along, too! As with many of the Duck TV productions, there is also an educational purpose to this bright and engaging cartoon. This will enhance your childs creativity and encourage them to think creatively, while keeping them entertained throughout.

programme.title: Whats Your Job?
programme.desc: "Whats Your Job" introduces younger audiences to various professions in society and combines education with enjoyment. When watching this series, parents are advised to talk about the jobs that are being shown so that they are able to learn why people do the profession that they do. Encouraging education and fun, this show introduces children to new words that they can learn but in a creative way.

programme.title: Partners in Fun

programme.title: Sunville

Creatively develop your childs imagination as you discover what an average day looks like in their friendly little village.

programme.title: We Are Playing Now
programme.desc: Educational childrens magazine exploring the world around us, including familiar people and objects through drawing and painting. It helps children develop cognitive skills, as well as parent-child emotional relations, introducing them to different situations.

programme.title: Color Magic
programme.desc: Watch as happy smiley blobs of paint in red, green, blue and yellow, dance across the screen, colouring in the outlined picture as they go, transforming dull and lifeless pictures into colourful and vibrant masterpieces. Let your imagination run wild with this simple but fun colouring show whilst also developing your basic visual skills, stimulating colour and shape recognition and identification.

programme.title: Vege-tales
programme.desc: In Veggie-tales, childrens animated series, talking fruit and vegetable perform theatrical productions based on very kind stories. Main characters Bob the Tomato and Larry the Cucumber with the help of other vegetables are telling stories and teaching kids the basic human values, like honesty, thankfulness, kindness.

programme.title: Animals
programme.desc: An educational show which teaches children everything they need to know about all sorts of animals, ranging from a familiar domestic cat or even the wildest of tigers found in the deepest of wildernesses. The programme explores how each and every one of these animals behaves, eats and plays and compares those characteristics to those us humans adopt.

programme.title: City Life
programme.desc: Learn all about everyday life in the city. Come along as we meet the places, vehicles, people and animals that we find in our city. programme.title: We Are Playing Now
programme.desc: Educational childrens magazine exploring the world around us, including familiar people and objects through drawing and painting. It helps children develop cognitive skills, as well as parent-child emotional relations, introducing them to different situations.

programme.title: The Nut Job
programme.desc: The Nut Job (2014) is a 3D computer-animated comedy directed by Peter Lepeniotis and starring the voices of Will Arnett and Brendan Fraser. A squirrel named Surly and his best friend Buddy are the inhabitants of a noisy metropolis. Its not easy to survive there and they dont get enough to eat quite often. But one day the friends come across a store that is full of nuts. Soon thereafter, Surly discovers that the owners of the shop are real criminals who are going to rob a bank.

programme.title: One Chance
programme.desc: One Chance (2013) is a biographical drama directed by David Frankel and starring James Corden and Julie Walters. Paul Potts is a 37-year-old shop assistant who lives in the attic of his parents house and dreams of singing on the stage. At the TV show Britains Got Talent Paul gets a chance to prove his worth, win the first season of the show and hearts of millions with his phenomenal voice.

programme.title: Film Set
programme.desc: English Club TV is a perfect chance to learn English or to improve the skills you already have. This educational program is a fun combination of education and entertainment, where students can learn English with the help of movies. Enlarge your vocabulary with some new words and useful phrases while watching some parts of movies and doing fun creative tasks after.

programme.title: Joan (suç Patronu)
programme.desc: Birleşik Krallıkın en unlu kadın mucevher hırsızı Joan Hanningtonın gerçek hikayesinden ilham alan, fakirlikten usta elmas hırsızlığına uzanan bu yolculuk 1980lerde Londrada yaşananları anlatır.

programme.title: Dalgliesh
programme.desc: 1970ler İngilteresinde geçen dizi, gizemli bir dedektif olan Dedektif Jamesin perspektifinden anlatılıyor ve sıra dışı cinayetlerin gizemini çozen Dalglieshin kariyerini gunumuzde takip ediyor.

programme.title: İmparatoriçe Sisi
programme.desc: Avrupanın ilk super starı ve umarsız bir ergen olan Sisi guçlu ve çekici bir adama aşık olur ama bu adamın karanlık bir yanı vardır. Sisinin karar verip zorlukları goğuslemesi gerekir.

programme.title: İmparatoriçe Sisi
programme.desc: Avrupanın ilk super starı ve umarsız bir ergen olan Sisi guçlu ve çekici bir adama aşık olur ama bu adamın karanlık bir yanı vardır. Sisinin karar verip zorlukları goğuslemesi gerekir.

programme.title: Agatha Christienin Marpleı
programme.desc: Amator dedektif Bayan Jane Marpleın bir çok cinayet gizem macerasına katılın; oldukça analitik bir zihne sahip olan Marple bir şekilde etrafındaki gizemli suçları ve cinayetleri kendine çekiyor gibi gorunuyor.

programme.title: Basketbol: Kadınlar Super Ligi
programme.desc: Basketbol Super Ligi, sponsorluk adıyla ING Basketbol Super Ligi, 1966 yılında Turkiye Basketbol Federasyonu tarafından kurulan ve Turkiyedeki en ust duzey profesyonel basketbol ligi. Normal lig karşılamaları, 16 takım arasında, her takımın biri kendi sahasında diğeri rakip takımın sahasında olmak uzere deplasmanlı, iki devreli ve lig usulu oynanır.

programme.title: Basketbol: Super Lig
programme.desc: Turk basketbolunun başlangıcı, ligin 1966da kurulmasından çok oncelere dayanmaktadır. Turkiyede bowling 20. yuzyılın başlarında biliniyordu. 1904 yılında İstanbuldaki Robert Kolej oğrencileri bu takım sporunun cazibesini ilk kez keşfettiler. Ligin kuruluşundan bir yıl sonra, en iyi Turk basketbol kuluplerinin ilk resmi yarışması başladı.

programme.title: Tarihte Bugun
programme.desc: Futbol tarihinin en iyi hamleleri hakkında bir program. Futbol geçmişindeki en guzel anlardan bazılarını, en iyi futbolcuları ve oyundaki başyapıtlarını hatırlayarak.

programme.title: Fenerium Saati
programme.desc: Fenerbahçe TV _ Beril Bokenin sunumu ile Feneriumun birbirinden renkli ve çeşitli urunleri Fenerium Saati programımızda sizlerle. Fenerbahçe TV yeni urunleri gosteriliyor.

programme.title: Basketbol: Euroleague
programme.desc: EuroLeague, sponsorluk adıyla Turkish Airlines EuroLeague, Avrupada 2000den beri Euroleague Basketball tarafından duzenlenen en ust duzeydeki ve kazananın Avrupa Şampiyonu olarak adlandırıldığı uluslararası profesyonel basketbol turnuvası

programme.title: Sportif
programme.desc: Fenerbahçe spor takımlarını tum yonleriyle ekranlara getiren "Sportif" programı FB TV ekranlarında yayınlanıyor. Futboldan voleybola, atletizmden yuzmeye kadar her alanda faaliyet gosteren Fenerbahçenin Turk sporuna olan katkıları değerlendiriliyor.

programme.title: Haber
programme.desc: Turkiyede ve dunyada yaşanan onemli gelişmelerin ayrıntıları izleyiciye taşınıyor. Siyasetten ekonomiye, spordan sanata, gundemi oluşturan haberlerin aktarıldığı programda, hava-yol durumu guncellemeleri de ekrana taşınıyor.

programme.title: Soz Taraftarda
programme.desc: Fenerbahçemizin ve Turk Futbolunun gundemini, yapacağımız maçların skorlarını Buyuk Fenerbahçe Taraftarına sorduğumuz Soz Taraftarda programının bolumlerinde.

programme.desc: Turk basketbolunun başlangıcı, ligin 1966da kurulmasından çok oncelere dayanmaktadır. Turkiyede bowling 20. yuzyılın başlarında biliniyordu. 1904 yılında İstanbuldaki Robert Kolej oğrencileri bu takım sporunun cazibesini ilk kez keşfettiler. Ligin kuruluşundan bir yıl sonra, en iyi Turk basketbol kuluplerinin ilk resmi yarışması başladı.

programme.title: Yarının Yıldızları
programme.desc: Fenerbahçenin tum yaş gruplarında yapılan çift kale maçlardan Yarının Yıldızlarında takip edin.

programme.title: Basketbol: Euroleague
programme.desc: EuroLeague, sponsorluk adıyla Turkish Airlines EuroLeague, Avrupada 2000den beri Euroleague Basketball tarafından duzenlenen en ust duzeydeki ve kazananın Avrupa Şampiyonu olarak adlandırıldığı uluslararası profesyonel basketbol turnuvası

programme.title: Doğanın Sesi
programme.desc: "Doğanın Sesi", insanla doğa arasındaki guçlu bağa yeniden dokunuyor. İklim değişikliği, çevre kirliliği ve tuketim alışkanlıklarının gezegenimize ve sağlığımıza etkileri alanında uzman isimlerin araştırmalarıyla bu programda! Doğa ve insan arasındaki guçlu bağı keşfedin.

programme.desc: Aret Vartanyan, gundemden insana derin bir bakış açısı sunmak için Haberturk TV ekranlarında izleyiciyle buluşuyor.Astroloji hayatımıza nasıl yon veriyor? 21 Eylulde gerçekleşecek guneş tutulması bize ne getirecek? programme.title: Cengiz Markal İle Doğa ve Yaşam
Gonulden Dile
programme.desc: Kanal 23 ekranlarında yayınlanan "Gonulden Dile" ile Elazığın, tarihi, sanatı, kulturu, efsaneleri bu programda konuşuluyor. Ahmet Bulutun sunumuyla "Gonulden Dile" her Pazar saat 11.00de Kanal 23 ekranlarında. Sakın kaçırmayın!

programme.title: Kırmızı Koltuk
programme.desc: Her hafta Turkiyenin tanınmış ve onemli isimlerini ağırlayan Kırmızı Koltuk programımızda, ilham verici hayat hikayelerini, başarı sırlarını ve gundemdeki konulara dair samimi sohbetleri izleyebilirsiniz. Ünlu konuklarımızın deneyimlerinden faydalanmak ve merak ettiğiniz sorulara yanıt bulmak için bizi takip edin!

programme.title: Kanal 7de Sabah
programme.desc: Meryem Nas, gundemin nabzını Kanal 7de Sabahta tutuyor. Siyasetin kalbi Ankara kulislerinden gelen sıcak haberler, Turkiye ve dunyanın gundemindeki olaylar, hayatın içinden haberler tum ayrıntılarıyla Kanal 7de Sabah ile ekranlara geliyor.

programme.title: Elif
programme.desc: Macera dolu sahneleriyle soluk soluğa izlenen Elifte Melek nihayet kızına kavuşur. Uzun uğraşlar sonucu birbirini Haktanırlar konağında bulan Melek ve Elif konaktan ayrılmaya karar verir. Tam konaktan ayrılacakları esnada Tarıkın adamı onları yakalar ve Meleki vurur. Elifi kaçırmak uzereyken Melek mudahale eder ve kızını adamın elinden kurtarır. Elifi de alıp kimsenin bilmediği bir yerde yeni bir hayat kurmak isteyen Melek izini kaybettirmeyi başarır.

programme.title: Necmettin Nursaçanla Cuma Sohbetleri
programme.desc: Cumartesi sabahları Nursaçanla Sohbetler ile taçlanıyor. İslamiyeti hakkıyla yaşayabilmek için akıllara takılan soruların yanıt bulduğu Nursaçanla Sohbetlerde Hz. Muhammedin Muslumanlara oğutleri, ahiret hayatının bilinmeyenleri, ahirette yaşanacağı belirtilen hadiseler ve insan ilişkilerinde dikkat edilmesi gereken noktalara yer veriliyor.

programme.title: Dunyanın Tadı
programme.desc: Dunya mutfaklarından farklı lezzetlerin ve yemek kulturlerinin ekrana taşındığı Dunyanın Tadı, Yasin Esirgençin sunumuyla izleyiciyle buluşuyor. İlginç yemek alışkanlıkları, birbirinden farklı lezzetler ve eşi benzeri gorulmemiş yiyecekler Dunyanın Tadında ekrana getiriliyor.

programme.title: Kanal 7 Hafta Sonu Haberleri
programme.desc: Hulya Seloninin sunduğu Haftasonu Haberlerinde, bir haftada, Turkiye ve dunyada yaşanan gelişmeler, son dakika haberleri, ozel dosyalar ve birbirinden ilginç haberler yer alıyor. Turkiye ve dunya gundeminde yaşananları ve haftaya damgasını vuran olayları uzman konukların da bakış açısıyla gormek istiyorsanız Hulya Seloniyle Haftasonu Haberlerini sakın kaçırmayın...

programme.title: Gunduz Gece
programme.desc: Sevilen turkucu Kurşatın eğlenceli sunumuyla Anadolunun saklı kalmış guzelliklerini ekrana getiren Gunduz Gece turuna hız kesmeden gezmeye devam ediyor. Memleket hasreti çekenlerin ozlemini dindirmek isteyen Gunduz Gece, Anadolu topraklarının guzelliklerini karış karış dolaşarak Kanal 7de ekrana taşıyor.

programme.title: Kanal 7de Sabah
programme.desc: Meryem Nas, gundemin nabzını Kanal 7de Sabahta tutuyor. Siyasetin kalbi Ankara kulislerinden gelen sıcak haberler, Turkiye ve dunyanın gundemindeki olaylar, hayatın içinden haberler tum ayrıntılarıyla Kanal 7de Sabah ile ekranlara geliyor.

programme.title: Elif
programme.desc: Macera dolu sahneleriyle soluk soluğa izlenen Elifte Melek nihayet kızına kavuşur. Uzun uğraşlar sonucu birbirini Haktanırlar konağında bulan Melek ve Elif konaktan ayrılmaya karar verir. Tam konaktan ayrılacakları esnada Tarıkın adamı onları yakalar ve Meleki vurur. Elifi kaçırmak uzereyken Melek mudahale eder ve kızını adamın elinden kurtarır. Elifi de alıp kimsenin bilmediği bir yerde yeni bir hayat kurmak isteyen Melek izini kaybettirmeyi başarır.

programme.title: Mustafa Karataşla Muhabbet Kapısı
programme.desc: Manevi hayatı şekillendiren konularda akıllara takılan sorular, İslamda birlik ve beraberliğin onemi, aile hayatında dikkat edilmesi gereken noktalar, gunluk yaşamda karşılaşılan sorunlar her hafta Nursel Tozkoparanın soruları, Prof. Dr. Mustafa Karataşın sohbetiyle Muhabbet Kapısında ekrana taşınıyor.

programme.title: Dunyayı Geziyorum
programme.desc: Milyarlarca insanın oluşturduğu farklı kulturler, farklı yaşamlar Dunyayı Geziyorum ile meraklılarıyla buluşuyor. Gezmeye gormeye fırsat bulamayanlar için dunyanın dort bir yanını ekrana taşıyan Özlem Tunca ve minik oğlu Yakupcan izleyicilerini dunya turuna çıkarıyor.

programme.title: Kanal 7 Hafta Sonu Haberleri
programme.desc: Hulya Seloninin sunduğu Haftasonu Haberlerinde, bir haftada, Turkiye ve dunyada yaşanan gelişmeler, son dakika haberleri, ozel dosyalar ve birbirinden ilginç haberler yer alıyor. Turkiye ve dunya gundeminde yaşananları ve haftaya damgasını vuran olayları uzman konukların da bakış açısıyla gormek istiyorsanız Hulya Seloniyle Haftasonu Haberlerini sakın kaçırmayın...

programme.title: TV Filmi
programme.desc: Çeşitli film turleri veya dizileri aracılığıyla onumuzdeki dakikalarda eğlenecek ve rahatlayacaksınız. Filmler ve diziler, hem genç hem de yaşlı izleyiciler için, hepimiz için gosterilir.

programme.title: TV Filmi
programme.desc: Çeşitli film turleri veya dizileri aracılığıyla onumuzdeki dakikalarda eğlenecek ve rahatlayacaksınız. Filmler ve diziler, hem genç hem de yaşlı izleyiciler için, hepimiz için gosterilir.

programme.title: Eşref Ruya
programme.desc: Eşref, hapishanede kurduğu hukmuyle duşmanlarına gozdağı vermeye devam eder, dışarıda ise Nisan şohret basamaklarını hızla tırmanır. Kadir, guç hırsıyla Yetimleri ilkelerinden saptıracak hamleler planlarken, yeni kuracağı ortaklık onu beklemediği bir durumun ortasında bırakır. Geçmişin karanlıklarından çıkan gizemli bir isim, Nisan ile Eşrefin hayatlarını sarsacak savaşın fitilini ateşleyince ikilinin aşkları bu zamana kadarki en buyuk sınavıyla karşı karşıya kalır.

programme.title: Poyraz Karayel
programme.desc: Aşkın ve nefretin, dostluğun ve duşmanlığın, iyiliğin ve kotuluğun en uçlarda yaşandığı bir hikaye...

programme.title: Kuzey Guney
programme.desc: Kuzey ve Guney, pusuladaki iki farklı yon gibi, karakterleri ve hayalleriyle de farklı iki kardeştir. Birbirlerine olan bağlılıkları dışında tek ortak noktalarıysa, babaları Sami’nin işlettiği simit fırınına sığamayacak kadar buyuk hayallerinin olmasıdır. Ancak iki kardeşin hayallerinin gerçeğe donuşebilmesi için kaderlerini de değiştirmeleri gerekecektir.

programme.title: Yabancı Damat
programme.desc: Gaziantepin unlu baklavacısı Kahraman Ustanın kızı Nazlı, Ankara da universite eğitimini bitirmiş memleketine donmuştur. Nazlı yakışıklı, yabancı bir gençle tanışır. Bu genç, ailesi İstanbuldan Atinaya goç etmiş Niko adında bir Yunanlıdır. Nazlı ve Niko birbirlerine deliler gibi aşık olurlar. Ancak Nikonun ailesi Turklerden, Nazlının ailesi de Yunanlılardan pek hoşlanmamaktadır...

programme.title: Konuştukça
programme.desc: Sunuculuğunu Özlem Yıldız yaptığı programda sağlıktan doğal yaşama, guzellikten kişisel bakıma, eğitimden psikolojiye kadar her şey konuşuluyor.

programme.title: Magazin D Cumartesi
programme.desc: Ünlulerin en ozel sırları, hiçbir yerde izleyemeyeceğiniz roportajlar, magazin dunyasındaki en son gelişmeler ekrana geliyor.

programme.title: Arka Sokaklar
programme.desc: Ekin sahibi olduğu fabrikayı zorla elinden almaya çalışan çete tarafından hamile eşiyle tehdit edilir. Çeteye yapılan operasyonlarda ekibimizle işbirliği yapanların bağlantıları işin seyrini değiştirir. Bir çatışma esnasında çete liderinin yeğenini olduren Hakan ise artık açık bir hedeftir. Barışın başına buyruk halleri ekipte goze batmaya başlar. Tek başına çalışmaya alışkın olan Bozo ekibe uyum sağlamakta zorlanır.

programme.title: Eşref Ruya
programme.desc: Eşref, hapishanede kurduğu hukmuyle duşmanlarına gozdağı vermeye devam eder, dışarıda ise Nisan şohret basamaklarını hızla tırmanır. programme.title: Kanal D Ana Haber
programme.desc: Gundemin nabzının tutulduğu ve son dakika gelişmelerinin ekrana aktarıldığı Kanal D Haber Haftasonu, Merve Dinçkolun sunumuyla ekrana geliyor.

programme.title: Arka Sokaklar

programme.title: Uzak Şehir
programme.desc: Cihanla Alya, tum engellere rağmen birbirlerine duydukları aşka sahip çıkarak konağa geri donerler. Mine cephesinde ise ofke, Sadakatinkinden farksızdır. Tehditlerinin hafife alındığını goren Mine, hırsının ateşiyle Alyaya yonelir. Öte yandan Şahin ile Narenin gizlice evlenmesi, Albora ailesinde adeta bir deprem yaratır. Cihan, Narenin bile bilmediği o sırrı ortaya doker. Ecmel ise ozgurluğun tadını çıkarırken, Alboraların nefesini kesmeye yemin eder. Aile içindeki kargaşayı fırsata çeviren Ecmel, kendi safındaki isimleri çoğaltmak için adımlarını hızlandırır.

programme.title: Poyraz Karayel
programme.desc: Aşkın ve nefretin, dostluğun ve duşmanlığın, iyiliğin ve kotuluğun en uçlarda yaşandığı bir hikaye...

programme.title: Muzik Arası
programme.desc: Sevilen sanatçıların video klipleri ekrana geliyor.

programme.title: Kuzey Guney

programme.title: Magazin D Pazar
programme.desc: Ünlulerin en ozel sırları, hiçbir yerde izleyemeyeceğiniz roportajlar, magazin dunyasındaki en son gelişmeler ekrana geliyor.

programme.title: Evrim Akın İle Ev Gezmesi
programme.desc: Renkli kişiliği ve hoş sohbeti ile izleyicilerin her daim beğenisini kazanan Evrim Akın, birbirinden unlu isimlerin evlerini gezerek çok ozel yaşantılarına tanık oluyor. Yaşam alanlarını çok merak ettiğimiz magazin dunyasının en sevilen isimlerinin evdeki yaşantılarına, mutfaklarına, salonlarına, giyinme odalarına konuk olmaya hazır mısınız?

programme.title: Yumurcak Kuçuk Şahit
programme.desc: Yumurcak hayal dunyasında dolaşan kuçuk bir çocuktur. Bir gece komşusunun cinayet işlediğini gorur fakat kimse ona inanmaz. Kendisini gorduğunu anlayan adam, yumurcağın peşine duşer. Fakat daha sonra cezasını bulacaktır.

programme.desc: Gundemin one çıkan başlıklarını onemli konuklar ve ozel haber dosyaları ile farklı bir açıdan ele alıyor. Kimi zaman sahadan kimi zamansa studyodan bildiriyor. Bir taraftan gundemin nabzını tutarken bir taraftan da gundemi belirliyor.

Yaban Hayatı Acil Servisi
programme.desc: Veteriner Clairele koala yavrularının bakımını ustlenin, dikenli tele takılan sincap planoru kurtarmak için gerekenleri gorun. Yorgun bir baykuşla ilgilenin; veteriner Tim, araba çarpan kaplumbağanın rontgenini çektiğinde buyuk surprize hazır olun.

programme.title: Yaban Hayatı Acil Servisi
programme.desc: Koalayı kurtarmak için yarışan veteriner Timi izleyin, veteriner Martinein yakın ilgisine ihtiyaç duyan ekstra parmaklı uçan tilkiyle tanışın. Veteriner Emilyle kanguru yavrusunun ezilme ihtimalini hesaplayın ve 50 lorinin salınmasını kutlayın.

programme.title: Vahşi Doğanın Simgeleri
programme.desc: Nil timsahı ve suaygırı Afrikanın simgesi olan iki yuzergezer tatlı su canlısıdır; Guney Afrikadaki Kwa-Zulu Natalın nefes kesen doğası dahil, kıtanın dort yanındaki su yollarında, nehirlerde ve gollerde bulunurlar. Bu iki tur binlerce yıl bir arada yaşamış, sudaki yaşamlarında farklı biçimde evrim geçirmiştir.

programme.title: Fırtına Çocuğu
programme.desc: Kış demir pençesini gevşetiyor. İzlandada kutup tilkileri çiftleşmek için dağları aşıyor. Shetlandda su samuru yavrularını buyutuyor. Norveçte ren geyiği surusu yavrulama alanlarına iniyor. Mart fırtınası Stormborn topraklarını kasıp kavuruyor.

programme.title: Fırtına Çocuğu
programme.desc: Kuzey Atlantikin yoğun ve kısa yaz mevsimini hayvan sakinleriyle birlikte yaşayın. Avlanmayı oğrenen kutup tilkisi yavrularını, ilk kez tek başına hareket eden su samuru yavrusunu, eş arayan martıyı ve minik ren geyiklerini takip edin.

programme.title: Buyuk Gollerin Doğası
programme.desc: Bir zamanlar nesli tukenmenin eşiğinde olan Erie Golu su yılanı, Buyuk Goller ekosistemine zarar veren istilacı kaya balığı sayesinde tekrar varlık gosteriyor. Bu çevresel anomali, sağlıklı bir ekolojik denge kurmak için çozulebilir mi?

programme.title: Afrikanın Gizli Krallıkları
programme.desc: Namaqualandın tozlu vadileri yılın buyuk kısmında çol olsa da, Ağustos ve Eylulun başlarında yaban çiçekleriyle ortulu bir harikalar diyarına donuşur. Kurak çolun buyuleyici biçimde guzel bir vahaya donuşmesine tanıklık edin.

programme.title: Kuzey Kutbunun Sırları
programme.desc: Bu bolumde yedi ay boyunca karanlığa mahkum olan Kuzey Kutup Dairesinin guneş ufukta yukselirken nasıl tekrar yaşam bulduğu adeta resmediliyor. Goç, kış uykusu, besin ağı, yaşam alanı değişikliği fikirlerini irdeliyoruz ve Kuzey Kutup Dairesinin en muhteşem ve simgesel varlıklarından bazılarını ve son derece çarpıcı doğasını tanıyoruz.

programme.title: Kuzey Kutbunun Sırları
programme.desc: Devon Adası dunyada, yaşamın olmadığı en buyuk ada. O kadar ucra ve korkutucu ki bilim insanları Marstaki yaşam şartlarını modellemek istediklerinde Devonu seçtiler. Devonın kurak doğası sadece en gozupek bitkileri ve birkaç hayvanı destekleyebiliyor.

programme.title: Kuzey Kutbunun Sırları
programme.desc: Kuzey Kutup Dairesinin batısındaki Mackenzie Deltası Kuzey Amerikanın Mississippiden sonraki en buyuk deltası. Burada, devasa, surekli donmuş tabakanın uzerinde, muazzam çeşitlilikteki mikroorganizmaların olduğu, tuhaf ve gizemli kara yaşam biçimleri ve surekli değişen Kuzey Kutup Dairesinin oykusunu anlatan garip canlılar var. Burası milyonlarca kuş, balık ve hayvanların yanı sıra, aynı zamanda insanların da goç ettiği bir yer ve yaz mevsiminde onların evi.

programme.title: Kuzey Kutbunun Sırları
programme.desc: “Koca Arazi” anlamındaki Nunavik Californiadan daha buyuk. Su, orman ve tundranın hakim olduğu bu bakir doğa parçası Kuzey Quebecteki İnuit halkının vatanı.

programme.title: Kuzey Kutbunun Sırları
programme.desc: Kanada’nın kutup bolgesindeki Baffin Adası kıyısının kuzey doğu kıyısı açıklarında bulunan Ninginganiq, sadece korkusuzların gittiği, tehlikeli bir doğa parçasıdır. Sonbaharda o kadar tehlikelidir ki emektar İnuit denizcileri bile uzak dururlar.

programme.title: Doğanın Muhafızları
programme.desc: Çok ozel bir maymun olan Madonna ile tanışın. O, doğumdan yetişkinliğe kadar incelenen ilk Kinda babunu ve şimdi işi onemli kendine bir eş arıyor. Başlı başına bir tur oldukları ancak yakın geçmişte tespit edilen Kinda bonoboları hakkındaki bilgimiz sınırlı. Ama Madonna sayesinde bu durum değişecek. Kindanın benzersiz kadın-erkek ilişkilerinin sırlarını açacak anahtar onun elinde olabilir. Bu babunlar diğerlerine hiç benzemiyor.

programme.title: Afrikanın Vahşi Ufukları
programme.desc: Doğu Cape Bolgesi balıkçılık ve ticari kalkınmaya alternatif olarak eko-turizme ve doğal hayatı korumaya yoğun olarak yatırım yapıyor. Bolge doğal hayat için tarım topraklarını geri kazanıyor ve balıkçılık alanlarını kapatıyor. Bu Afrikada doğal hayatı korumaya dair en heyecan verici başarı oykusu.

programme.title: Doğanın Kalbindeki Kaleler
programme.desc: Kalıntıları Almanyanın batısındaki Neckar nehrinin yakınında bulunan guzel Heidelberg Kalesini keşfedin. Koruma altındaki bir doğa rezervi ile desteklenen bu kale yırtıcı kuşlara ev sahipliği yapar ve yakındaki yuzer-gezer hayvanların ureme yeri olarak hizmet gorur.

programme.title: Doğanın Kalbindeki Kaleler
programme.desc: Fransada bulunan, geçmişi asırlara dayanan, tarihin en buyuk imparatorluklarından bazılarına ev sahipliği yapmış olan bir kaleye seyahat edin. Bir zamanlar zenginlik ve kulturun merkezi olan Carcassone artık doğal hayat için bir cennet. Kuşlar, yaban domuzları ve bocek orduları kalenin guzel çevresinde yaşamlarını surduruyor.

programme.title: Doğanın Kalbindeki Kaleler
programme.desc: Dunyanın, bir kayaya oyularak inşa edilmiş olan en buyuk kalesini keşfedin. Slovenyada bulunan Predjama sadece Orta Çağdaki insan sakinlerine koruma sağlamakla kalmadı, aynı zamanda bolgede yaşayan kuşlar, yaban domuzları ve keçiler için de bir cennet niteliğinde.

programme.title: Doğanın Kalbindeki Kaleler
programme.desc: İspanyanın Granada bolgesinde gorulmesi gereken bir kale olan muhteşem Elhamrayı turlayın. Gunumuzde, dunya mirası sıfatını taşıyan bu yer, bolgedeki doğal hayat için sığınak niteliğinde. Elhamra, sayısız deresi ve çeşmesi ile, yuzer-gezer canlılar, balıklar ve kuşlara kucak açıyor.

programme.title: Dunyada Vahşi bir Yıl
programme.desc: Yılın ilk aylarında dunyanın eksen eğimi bazı yerlere yazın yuksekliğini, bazı yerlere de kışın derinliklerini getirir. Bu aşırı koşullar altında canlıların nasıl hayatta kalma savaşı verdiğini izleyin.

programme.title: Dunyada Vahşi bir Yıl
programme.desc: Dunya çapında seyahat ederek Japonyanın her yanında açılan kiraz çiçeklerinden yumurtlamak için Buyuk Bariyer Rif adalarına gelen son yeşil deniz kaplumbağası grubuna kadar, Mart ayında gerçekleşen atmosfer değişikliklerine tanık olun.

programme.title: Dunyada Vahşi bir Yıl
programme.desc: Kuzey Yarıkurede yazın gelişimini izleyin. Ekvatora yakın bolgeler yağışlı mevsime girerken Guney Afrika ise kuraklaşır. Bu bazı canlılar için kıtlık, bazıları içinse bereket getirir.

programme.title: Gundoğumundan Gunbatımına
programme.desc: Meksikadan Peruya ve hatta en batıdaki Galapagos Adalarına kadar, penguenler, iguanalar, kaplumbağalar, kurbağalar ve ipek maymunlarını izleyin ve guneşin sıcaklığı, kol gezen avcı hayvanlar ve tehlikeli hava şartlarından etkilenen gunluk dramlarına tanık olun.

programme.title: Gundoğumundan Gunbatımına
programme.desc: Tibet platosundan Taylanddaki sık yağmur ormanlarına ve Vietnamdaki dolambaçlı mangrovlara kadar, canlıların, yiyecek arayarak, ustunluk kurmak için kavga ederek ve ailelerini genişleterek, yılda bir kez gun ışığında nasıl dort saat daha hayatta kaldıklarını izleyin.

programme.title: Gundoğumundan Gunbatımına
programme.desc: Penguenler, uçmayan kuşlar deniz aslanları ve kopekbalıkları dahil, Yeni Zelandadaki anakara ve ada canlıları, bu deniz ortamında yavrularını beslemeye ve korumaya çalışırken, bir hayvan ailesinin trajedisinin nasıl başka bir ailenin yılbaşı yemeği olduğunu izleyin.

programme.title: Gundoğumundan Gunbatımına
programme.desc: Tatile hiç benzemeyen bir gunde, anne ve anne adayı olan hayvanlar boğucu sıcaklarla, pusuya yatan avcılarla, çiftleşme mevsimiyle ve kuraklıkla mucadele ederken, hangi canlıların hayatta kaldığını, hangilerinin şanslarının tukendiğini oğrenin.

programme.title: Buyuk Gollerin Doğası
programme.desc: Hayvanlar ve insanların bir arada yaşadığı yerlerde, kotu bir unun bir turu tukenmeye itmesini nasıl engellersiniz? Çıngıraklı yılanlardan tepeli karabataklara kadar, kotu une sahip canlıların soylarının korunması açısından nasıl ele alındığını izleyin.

programme.title: Afrikanın Gizli Krallıkları
programme.desc: Bu kuçuk park nesli tukenmekte olan hayvanlar açısından buyuk bir fark yaratır. Dunyanın en buyuk ve en kuçuk hayvanlarından bazılarına sığınak sunan bu yerde, turlerin yok oluşun kıyısından donerek Afrikanın vahşi doğasında yerlerini nasıl geri aldıklarını izleyin.

programme.title: Brezilyanın Yabani Yuzu
programme.desc: Brezilyadaki Amazon Yağmur Ormanının guney kıyısında bulunan, koruma altındaki ormanda, Yeni Dunyanın en zeki ve çevik maymunlarından biri olan beyaz bıyıklı orumcek maymunu yaşar. Uzun kuyruğu adeta beşinci bir uzuv gibidir ve ağaç tepesinden yere nadiren iner. Onlar ormanın “elçileridir.”

programme.title: Brezilyanın Yabani Yuzu
programme.desc: Pantanalın kuzey ucunda, dunyadaki en buyuk tropik sulak alanların birinde, olağanustu bir kemirgen ailesine ev sahipliği yapan kuçuk bir gol bulunur. Bunlar tipik sıçan ya da sincap değildir; bu dev hayvanlar koyun buyukluğundedir! Bu grup, kurak mevsimin ortasında, bir duzine yavruyu yetiştirmek ve guvenliklerini sağlamak zorundadır. Bu zorlu bir gorevdir; çunku ne kadar buyuk olsalar da bu nazik devler birçok avcının menusundedir.

programme.title: Brezilyanın Yabani Yuzu
programme.desc: Her yıl, kurak mevsimde, sel suları ortadan kalkarken, Pantanaldeki çayırlar birçok ture ev sahipliği yapar dev karıncayiyenler, yeleli kurtlar ve daha buyuk Amerikan devekuşları (Guney Amerikadaki en buyuk kuş).

programme.title: Brezilyanın Yabani Yuzu
programme.desc: Pantanalın guney ucunda, dunyanın en buyuk tropik sulak alanlarından birinde, Biyolog Carolina Ribas ve yerel rehberi Arilei Terena bir dev susamuru inini aramaktadırlar. Buyuk cusselerine, gurultucu ve girgin yapılarına karşın, soyu tehlike altındaki dev susamurları utangaçlıklarıyla un salmıştır ve bulunmaları zordur.

programme.title: Brezilyanın Yabani Yuzu
programme.desc: Pantanal dunyanın en buyuk bitki ve hayvan yaşamı rezervuarlarından biridir. Bilim insanları bu yerin 80 memeli turune, 650 kuş turune, 50 surungen turune ve 300den fazla balık turune ev sahipliği yapar. Burası dunyanın en buyuk tropik sulak alanıdır, ancak bir yuva olarak en acımasız yaşam alanlarından biridir.

programme.title: Doğanın Muhafızları
programme.desc: Afrika çapında, siyah gergedanların %97si boynuzları için olduruldu. 1997de bu turun Zambiyada resmi olarak soyu tukendiği ilan edildi. Ama şimdi, iddialı geri getirme programı sayesinde yeniden buradalar. Kaçak avlanma ortadan kalkmadı, boynuzları Asyada hala değerli bir ilaç olarak goruluyor. Ancak kuçuk, kararlı bir ekip onları guvende tutmak için savaşıyor. Bu doğal hayatı korumanın on cephesi, işin en zorlu kısmı burası.

programme.title: Orangutan Orman Okulu
programme.desc: Clara ve bebek Clarita, Bangamat Adasına taşınacak kadar guçlu ama duşmanca karşılanırlar. Kasper vahşi doğaya bırakılmaya hazır. Ünlu olan Taymur yeni arkadaş edinmeye çalışır.

programme.title: Orangutan Orman Okulu
programme.desc: Bu orangutanlar çok yol katetti! 6 orman okulu mezunu serbest ve milli parkta hayata başlamaya hazır. Sakar tırmanıcı Malika sınıfa ayak uydurur ve Beninin diyetiyle baş etmek zor

programme.title: Kangurunun Gizli Yaşamı
programme.desc: Doğu Gri kanguru sosyal bir turdur, çeteler olarak bilinen kuçuk gruplar halinde kumelenir. Çete, beslenmeye odaklı sosyal bir ağdır. Üyeler gıdanın bulunabilirliğine bağlı olarak, istedikleri gibi gelip giderler.

programme.title: Kangurunun Gizli Yaşamı
programme.desc: Doğu Gri kangurular yoğun olarak urerler, ancak bir yavruyu buyutmek zorlu bir sureçtir. Avcılar, iklimin zorlukları ve hareketli yavru kangurular, annelerin yavruları canlı tutmaya yonelik gunluk mucadelelerle karşı karşıya kalmasına neden olur.

programme.title: Kangurunun Gizli Yaşamı
programme.desc: Doğu Gri kolonisinde, arazide dolanan, toplumda ust duzeye tırmanan ve çiftleşme hakları için savaşan birçok farklı erkek kanguruyu izleyin. Bu kangurular için, turlerini devam ettirme gudusu risk ve odulle dolu bir yaşam vadeder.

programme.title: Açlık Oyunları Alaskanın Buyuk Ayı Mucadelesi
programme.desc: Yarışmanın 1. Etabı başlarken 7 ayıyla birlikte kış uykusundan uyanın. Yeni anne BoldFace ile kurtlarla savaşın, minik Stomperın guç ve Blondienin sevgisi için yarıştığını gorun ve yaşlı veteriner Bernienin genç Casanova ile tartışmasını izleyin.

programme.title: Açlık Oyunları Alaskanın Buyuk Ayı Mucadelesi
programme.desc: 1. Etabın kazananları ve yeni uyelerle birlikte Temmuzdaki somon yarışına katılın. BigBoinin yiyecek bulma yolculuğuna eşlik edin, QuadMom ve RedBacki ziyafete davet edin ve BoldFacein hayatta kalan yavrusunu guvende tutup tutamayacağını gorun.

programme.title: Hayvanların Hayatta Kalma Mucadelesi
programme.desc: Namibya çolunde savan filiyle yuruyuşe çıkın, az yiyecek ve golgenin olduğu bir yerde nasıl serin kalabildiğini oğrenin. Bu devin nasıl bazı bitkileri tukettiğini, kuyular kazdığını ve değerli suyu bulmak için sonsuz kumullarda yuruduğunu keşfedin.

programme.title: Hayvanların Hayatta Kalma Mucadelesi
programme.desc: Sulak kokler arasında yaşama mukemmel uyum sağlayan tuzlu su timsahıyla Borneodaki mangrov ormanında gezinin. Bu surungenin vucut ısısını duzenlemek için çevreyi nasıl kullandığını ve muthiş sabrının onu neden super bir avcı yaptığını keşfedin.

programme.title: Hayvanların Hayatta Kalma Mucadelesi
programme.desc: Ormanın usta mimarı orangutanla yuva yapma sanatını keşfedin. Borneo yağmur ormanının boceklerle dolu zemininden kaçmaya çalışan ve bu yalnız primatın doğal muhendislik becerisinden ilham alan Maxi izleyin.

programme.title: Hayvanların Hayatta Kalma Mucadelesi
programme.desc: Guçlu maymunları kendisinin duşman değil, dost olduğunu ikna etmeye çalışan Maxle Ruanda ormanlarında şempanzelerin izini surun. Ormanda yemek yeme konusunda onemli ipuçları oğrenin, bakım ve sosyalleşme gibi karmaşık aile dinamiklerine tanık olun.

programme.title: Hayvanların Hayatta Kalma Mucadelesi
programme.desc: Korkusuz ve çoğunlukla yanlış anlaşılan tembel ayının gizli dunyasına bir goz atın. Max ile Sri Lankaya seyahat edin ve bu vahşi hayvanın nasıl leoparlarla ve diğer olumcul rakipleriyle savaştığını ve hayatta kalmaya çalıştığını keşfedin.

programme.title: Briko
programme.desc: Evimizdeki sıradan malzemelerle oyunlar uretmek, oyuncaklar yapmak mumkun. Briko ile her bolumde onlarca yaratıcı fikri hayata geçirmeyi, kullanışlı eşyalar yapmayı ve gundelik eşyalara farklı bir gozle bakmayı oğreniyoruz. En yakın arkadaşı Hepi ile birlikte çeşitli objelerden birbirinden eğlenceli oyuncaklar yapan Briko, hayal gucumuzu ve el becerimizi geliştirmemize de yardımcı olacak. “Kendin Yap” konsepti uzerine kurulmuş Briko’da boş bir yumurta kutusunun bir gozluğe ya da bir saksıya donuşmesi mumkun.
